identity.mission: Create a 'Cyber-Swiss' utility tool that feels like a high-end developer console. Precision, speed, and clarity are paramount.

structure.right_panel: lg:col-span-5 flex flex-col gap-4 h-full border-l border-border/50 pl-6

buttons.primary: bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90 text-white font-mono text-sm uppercase tracking-wider rounded-none border border-primary/50 shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(59,130,246,0.3)] transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent hover:bg-white/5 text-white font-mono text-sm uppercase tracking-wider rounded-none border border-white/20 transition-all

inputs.base: bg-surface border border-border rounded-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary focus:border-primary font-mono text-sm placeholder:text-muted
inputs.file_dropzone: border-2 border-dashed border-border hover:border-primary/50 bg-surface/50 transition-colors cursor-pointer flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-4 p-12 group relative overflow-hidden

panels.card: bg-surface border border-border rounded-none p-0 overflow-hidden relative
panels.terminal: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-border font-mono text-sm p-4 overflow-y-auto custom-scrollbar

visual_enhancers.scanline: pointer-events-none absolute inset-0 bg-[linear-gradient(rgba(18,16,16,0)_50%,rgba(0,0,0,0.25)_50%),linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(255,0,0,0.06),rgba(0,255,0,0.02),rgba(0,0,255,0.06))] z-50 bg-[length:100%_2px,3px_100%] opacity-20

images.description: Subtle noise texture for background overlay

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPORT FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import link to the <head> of index.html or import in index.css immediately.
2. GLOBAL STYLES: Apply the 'noise_overlay' to the body to give a subtle texture.
3. LAYOUT: Implement the Split-Screen Bento Grid. Left side for Video Upload/Preview, Right side for Transcript/Output.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Customize Shadcn components to remove rounded corners (rounded-none) and use borders to create a 'technical' look.
5. TERMINAL LOOK: The transcript area should look like a code editor or terminal log. Use JetBrains Mono, line numbers (optional), and high contrast text.
6. PROGRESS: When processing, show a 'scanning' animation or a progress bar that looks like a system loader.
7. NO ROUNDED CORNERS: This is a precision tool. Avoid rounded-lg or rounded-xl. Stick to rounded-none or rounded-sm max.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, dropzones).
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements (z-index).
Use glass-morphism effects sparingly, prefer solid high-contrast panels for this utility.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover states, transitions).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable inside containers.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
